body: The variant of toIValue without a TypePtr only works for a limited set of types. These functions should just be implemented in Python and return a separate 'fake' Python future object.
body_html: The variant of toIValue without a TypePtr only works for a limited set of types. These functions should just be implemented in Python and return a separate 'fake' Python future object.
